DOC.brief_summary: This study is to describe the safety and immunogenicity of 13vPnC in Indian adults 50 to 65 years of age and in Indian children 6 to 17 years of age.
DOC.brief_title: 13-valent Pneumococcal Conjugate Vaccine Study in Adults and Children in India
DOC.criteria: Indian adults subjects between 50 and 65 years of age and indian children between 6 and 17years of age, determined by clinical judgment to be eligible for 13vPnC vaccination. Any contraindication to 13vPnC vaccination, vaccination with any pneumococcal vaccine within the last year
DOC.keyword: pneumococcal disease prevention; safety and immunogenicity study
